server.app.main.models module¶

class server.app.main.models.GameRoom(name, pwd, players_amount, bots_amount, creator)¶

Bases: sqlalchemy.orm.decl_api.Model

This is a Game Room model. Its contains information about game

Parameters

  • name (str) – name of a room

  • pwd (str) – password of a room

Variables

  • rules – rules of a room

  • date – date of room creation

  • creator_id – id of room creator

  • game – game object

  • is_running – running state

  • is_ended – ended state

add()¶

add room to DB

add_game()¶

creates Game() and add it to DB

Returns
